opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
535 U.S. 1076

MATHIAS ET AL.
v.
WORLDCOM TECHNOLOGIES, INC., ET AL.

No. 00-878.

Supreme Court of the United States.

May 20, 2002.

1

C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 532 U. S. 903.] Motions of respondents WorldCom Technologies, Inc., et al. and Illinois Bell Telephone Co., dba Ameritech Illinois, for leave to file supplemental briefs after argument granted. JUSTICE O'CONNOR took no part in the consideration or decision of these motions.
